Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.norconex.collector.http.doc.IHttpDocumentProcessor
    Since 2.8.0, use IHttpDocumentProcessor
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.norconex.collector.http.crawler.HttpCrawlerEvent.REJECTED_CANONICAL
    Since 2.8.0, use HttpCrawlerEvent.REJECTED_NONCANONICAL.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.RegexLinkExtractor.addPattern(String, int)
    Since 2.8.0, use RegexLinkExtractor.addPattern(String, String) instead.
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.RegexLinkExtractor.getPatternMatchGroup(String)
    Since 2.8.0, use #getPatternReplacement(String) instead. It will return the group id if the "replacement" value only contains a group replacement (e.g. $1), else, it will always return -1.
    com.norconex.collector.http.client.impl.GenericHttpClientFactory.getRequestHeaders()
    Since 2.8.0 use GenericHttpClientFactory.getRequestHeaderNames()
    com.norconex.collector.http.fetch.impl.PhantomJSDocumentFetcher.getScreenshotDir()
    Since 2.8.0, use PhantomJSDocumentFetcher.getScreenshotStorageDiskDir()
    com.norconex.collector.http.sitemap.impl.StandardSitemapResolverFactory.getSitemapLocations()
    Since 2.3.0, use HttpCrawlerConfig.getStartSitemapURLs()
    com.norconex.collector.http.sitemap.impl.StandardSitemapResolver.getSitemapLocations()
    Since 2.3.0, use HttpCrawlerConfig.getStartSitemapURLs()
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.TikaLinkExtractor.isKeepReferrerData()
    Since 2.6.0, referrer data is always kept
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.GenericLinkExtractor.isKeepReferrerData()
    Since 2.6.0, referrer data is always kept
    com.norconex.collector.http.client.impl.GenericHttpClientFactory.isStaleConnectionCheckDisabled()
    Since 2.1.0. As of 2.2.0, use GenericHttpClientFactory.getMaxConnectionInactiveTime() instead.
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.TikaLinkExtractor.setKeepReferrerData(boolean)
    Since 2.6.0, referrer data is always kept
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.GenericLinkExtractor.setKeepReferrerData(boolean)
    Since 2.6.0, referrer data is always kept
    com.norconex.collector.http.fetch.impl.PhantomJSDocumentFetcher.setScreenshotDir(String)
    Since 2.8.0, use PhantomJSDocumentFetcher.setScreenshotStorageDiskDir(String)
    com.norconex.collector.http.sitemap.impl.StandardSitemapResolverFactory.setSitemapLocations(String...)
    Since 2.3.0, use HttpCrawlerConfig.setStartSitemapURLs(String[])
    com.norconex.collector.http.sitemap.impl.StandardSitemapResolver.setSitemapLocations(String...)
    Since 2.3.0, use HttpCrawlerConfig.setStartSitemapURLs(String[])
    com.norconex.collector.http.client.impl.GenericHttpClientFactory.setStaleConnectionCheckDisabled(boolean)
    Since 2.1.0. As of 2.2.0, use GenericHttpClientFactory.setMaxConnectionInactiveTime(int) instead.
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.norconex.collector.http.url.impl.GenericURLNormalizer.Normalization.addTrailingSlash
    Since 2.6.0, use GenericURLNormalizer.Normalization.addDirectoryTrailingSlash
